Unique Designed - Comfortable elastic earloop, extra-soft ear loops reduce pressure to the ears. Adjustable metal nose clip, offer a full coverage over nose and mouth with a snug secure fit.
MADE WITH CARE, BECAUSE WE CARE - TomrickCare disposable black face mask is more Breathable and Skin-friendly. Great choices for you or your family. Please stay safe out there!

100% Brand New and High Quality - Each Tomrickcare face mask passed strict pressure test, air permeability test. We have protected millions people, and we've got high feedback from customers. Choosing us, your health we guard.

BREATHABLE & COMFORTABLE Easily adjustable and exceptionally comfortable, these Breathable face mask giving you a very comfortable experience at anytime. MULTI-USE FOR DAILY Great for daily protection. From crowded city streets to cramped office spaces. FULL COVERAGE Wrap-around design covering nose, mouth, and chin. Flexible nose bar for a better fit, soft to the skin and is easier to breathe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great alternative to black Costco masks
reviews.reviewText: My Costco is out of black masks, which is why I ordered these. They are a few dollars more than Costco's, but they are also individually wrapped, which is nice. I can toss a few in my bag or car and not worry about keeping them clean.The quality of these is great. None of them have broken on me so far, and the nose wire is secure in the mask. These are a bit smaller than Costco's black masks, so they fit a bit tighter (which I like, since Costco's were a bit loose on me).Only minor downside is that they fit snuggly against the undereye area, which can be slightly uncomfortable, but I don't mind it much. I'd rather my mask be snug than loose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very convienent. Individually package. That makes them sanitary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and breathable for small children!!
reviews.reviewText: Like millions of parents this year, we were dreading sending out children to school wearing a mask all day. I bought many different kinds or cloth masks and was so nervous because my child didn’t want to keep them on. I saw these and loved the fact that they are individually wrapped so we can just pack extra in the backpack without them getting dirty. Also, not having to keep up with mask laundry is AMAZING. Gave them a shot, and wow, we are so impressed!! My 5 year old wears it all day at kindergarten and says it’s comfortable and she forgets she’s even wearing it. Thank goodness! For anyone that is struggling with worry about their child being able to breathe easily in a mask, I highly recommend trying these! I would say one of out of ten break during the day, not too shabby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty small in size
reviews.reviewText: They seem well made and are comfortable on the ears. Nicely individually wrapped and a good value. But it is Immediately noticeable that they are very small in size compared to the blue or white ones that I usually buy from Costco. They fit under the blue one very nicely when I double mask now with omicron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed with quality!
reviews.reviewText: We bought these for our kids (12, 10, 9, 6, 4) for a road trip/ vacation to Disney. They were comfortable for the entire day- no complaints about ears hurting or feeling like they were too thick.The masks are all individually wrapped, which I prefer because then I can have extras on hand. I have given masks to random people that have forgotten theirs and it's always nice to hand a wrapped one so that it's obviously unused.The fit: We had to twist the loops for the 4 year old, the mask was a little big and so it would slide down under her nose (side note- Disney was strict, but very kind about the masks); my kiddo with sensory processing disorder didn't mind the feel/ fit; the ear loops are stretchy enough that the masks even work for me (adult with a small/ medium head)!Durability: the kids started wearing these around 9:30a and we had some of them get new ones after a late lunch (2:30) only because we have some kids that chew/ lick their masks (so. gross!) We also had a kiddo get a new mask around 6p because he got a bloody nose (extra nasty!)... We have only had 2 masks where earloops have ripped off, but I'm pretty sure there was some foul play involved... I have had cheap disposable masks where the nose wire has ripped out, so based on the price, I was concerned that would happen with these. However we haven't had that issue at all. These have held up nicely!The only con for me is that if you have cheeto or chocolate fingers (or a bloody nose) it will show up on the white mask. (If you have chocolate all over your mouth, it will not show through though.)We were surprised with the quality, especially considering the price! We will be buying these again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality Kids Mask
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these masks for my daughter and contunue to purchase them regularly. They are individually wrapped. They fit her face well. Pink is her favorite color and this company carries the pink (as well as other colors). I will continue to purchase the masks and would recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love these...easy and convenient to use and carry. Affordable. Buy over and over

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as pictured ):
reviews.reviewText: Not as pictured! The advertised picture shows INDIVIDUALLY packed in plastic, but not. They’re 10 grouped in plastic but not individually like the Kids one. I get the description says in groups of 10, then please change the advertised picture. I bought quickly because the photo looks just like the same brand of the children’s individually packed masks. They’re sort of flimsy too. Feels like it’s not as thick and protective as others I have ordered in the past.
